mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.order_id, p.external_id, p.channel, p.amount, p.currency, p.status, p.request_payload, p.response_payload, p.notify_payload, p.last_polled_at, p.last_notified_at, p.created_at, p.updated_at, o.order_no AS orderNo FROM payment_order p JOIN orders o ON o.id = p.order_id WHERE p.id = #{paymentId} LIMIT 1
